document_data.mainbody:
he Fences Syndicate was, for all intents and purposes, the guildhall for fences and other members of the black market within Daggerford in the Western Heartlands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The guildhall was located at the main entrance into Daggerford through the Caravan Gate. It sat next to the Daggerford Inn on Wall Street and Rogar Alley.
Anyone wishing to do business within the guildhall was subjected to a thorough background check by a variety of magic items or spells.
